name: Anomaly Detection – APM – Error Rate – More Than Usual Errors Detected in a Service

alertDefProperties.name: Anomaly Detection – APM – Error Rate – More Than Usual Errors Detected in a Service
alertDefProperties.description:
This alert monitors the error rate of each instrumented service, operation and http method. The alert when the error rate deviates significantly (20%) above its normal historical baseline.
Coralogix’s anomaly detection automatically learns typical error patterns (including natural daily or weekly fluctuations) and flags when a service begins returning more errors than usual.

metricFilter.promql: (sum(increase(calls_total{span_kind=~"SPAN_KIND_CONSUMER|SPAN_KIND_SERVER", status_code="STATUS_CODE_ERROR"})) by (span_name, http_method, service_name) > 0)[30s] or on () vector(0)
